data.name: DRAGON BALL FIGHTERZ - Super Baby 2
data.detailed_description:
The Ultimate Malign Being, Super Baby 2, now comes to DRAGON BALL FighterZ!

This content includes:
• Super Baby 2 as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for his outfit
• Super Baby 2 Lobby Avatar
• Super Baby 2 Z Stamp
data.about_the_game:
The Ultimate Malign Being, Super Baby 2, now comes to DRAGON BALL FighterZ!

This content includes:
• Super Baby 2 as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for his outfit
• Super Baby 2 Lobby Avatar
• Super Baby 2 Z Stamp
data.short_description: The Ultimate Malign Being, Super Baby 2, now comes to DRAGON BALL FighterZ!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400, 3.2 GHz / Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB / GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
